DROP TABLE mupe.symptom;

DROP TABLE mupe.food;

-- 
-- Dropping a table mupe.meal_content 
-- 
DROP TABLE mupe.meal_content;

-- 
-- Creating a table mupe.symptom 
-- 
CREATE TABLE mupe.symptom (
   symptom_id BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   symptom_cat BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   value LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
   symptom_date DATETIME NOT NULL,
   PRIMARY KEY (symptom_id)
);

DROP TABLE mupe.food;

-- 
-- Dropping a table mupe.caterory 
-- 
DROP TABLE mupe.caterory;

-- 
-- Creating a table mupe.caterory 
-- 
CREATE TABLE mupe.caterory (
   category_id BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   name LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
   PRIMARY KEY (category_id)
);

-- 
-- Creating a table mupe.food 
-- 
CREATE TABLE mupe.food (
   food_id BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   category_fkid BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   name LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
   category_id BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   PRIMARY KEY (food_id),
   CONSTRAINT FK_food_caterory_0 FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES mupe.caterory (category_id)
);


-- 
-- Creating a table mupe.meal_content

DROP TABLE mupe.meal_content;

-- 
-- Creating a table mupe.meal_content 
-- 
CREATE TABLE mupe.meal_content (
   meal_id BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   meal_date DATETIME NOT NULL,
   meal_code BIGINT(18) NOT NULL,
   meal_code_str LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
   meal_cat_10 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_11 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_12 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_13 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_20 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_21 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_22 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_23 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_30 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_31 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_32 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_33 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_40 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_41 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_42 LONGTEXT NULL,
   meal_cat_43 LONGTEXT NULL,
   PRIMARY KEY (meal_id)
);
